name: Digital Marketing Fundamentals
current_catalog_description: Gain a solid foundation in digital marketing tools and understand how each tool can fit into overall marketing strategy. Leave class with a website you created.
days_and_times: Virtual Meetings | Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, 9 a.m. -  4 p.m.

name: Certified Digital Marketing Professional (CDMP)
current_catalog_description: Deepen your understanding of email, mobile, social media and digital advertising strategy in this certification program. Leave class with a digital strategy in-hand.
days_and_times: Virtual meetings | Monday (6/7), Wednesday (6/9), and Friday (6/11) and the following Monday (6/14), Wednesday (6/16), and Friday (6/18), 9 a.m.-3 p.m.

name: Mini MBA
current_catalog_description: Gain a solid foundation in business and leadership strategy while learning skills you can put to work right away. Practice these skills with a business simulation.

name: Certified Professional Project Manager (CPPM)
current_catalog_description: Build your leadership and decision-making skills while exploring best practices and tools for effective project management. Gain new information and the CPPM certification.

name: Agile Project Management
current_catalog_description: Dive into the agile methodology in this three-day program. Learn to complete projects more efficiently and earn a St. Thomas Certified Agile Practitioner certification (UST-CAP).
days_and_times: Virtual Meetings | Thurs. 6/17, Tues. 6/22, Thurs. 6/24, Mon. 6/28, Tues. 6/29, Wed. 6/30; 8 a.m. - 12 p.m.

name: Solving Problems with Design Thinking
current_catalog_description: Wicked problems, the difficult problems which resist resolution, need a creative approach. Learn how to use design thinking to lead your team or projects toward customer centric solutions with this hands-on, interactive program.

name: Strategies for Effective Negotiation
current_catalog_description: Learn the art and science of negotiation with in-class practice to apply these skills. Whether negotiating via email, in-person or virtually, you will leave prepared for success.

name: Online Certified Professional Project Manager (CPPM)
current_catalog_description: Learn effective project management skills and principles through this online offering of the CPPM certification program. Gain skills that can be applied right away.

name: Certified Professional Project Manager (CPPM)
current_catalog_description: Build your leadership and decision-making skills while exploring best practices and tools for effective project management. Gain new information and the CPPM certification.

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Laying the Foundation for Fund Development
marketing_name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Laying the Foundation for Fund Development
current_catalog_description: New to fundraising? Start your fundraising career with an understanding of the terminology and the various stakeholders involved in the fundraising process.

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Annual Strategies
current_catalog_description: Gain the tools to create or enhance the annual fundraising plan for your organization. Set the stage for philanthropic fundraising with the right plan in place.

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Asking for Major Gifts
marketing_name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Asking for Major Gifts
current_catalog_description: From identifying potential benefactors, creating a strategy, to closing the agreement, increase your effectiveness in asking for major gifts.

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Transformational Nonprofit Leadership
marketing_name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Transformational Nonprofit Leadership
current_catalog_description: Combine leadership theory and practice with the philanthropic spirit in this one-day program. Identify behaviors and skills needed to become a more successful fundraising leader.

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Donor Motivation
current_catalog_description: Donors are motivated by many things - some outside of your control. Explore ways to better understand your donors and learn methods to help them make generous and wise decisions.

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Nonprofit Messaging that Drives Giving
marketing_name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Nonprofit Messaging that Drives Giving
current_catalog_description: Explore proven techniques for getting your message to potential donors. Learn the components of a marketing and media relations plan that will drive giving.

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Researching, Cultivating and Appreciating Foundations & Corporate Sponsors
marketing_name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Researching, Cultivating and Appreciating Foundations & Corporate Sponsors
current_catalog_description: Understand how foundations and corporate sponsors could fit into your fundraising plan. Explore trends in foundation gifting and ethical issues surrounding marketing sponsorship.

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Planned Giving and Capital Campaigns
marketing_name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Planned Giving and Capital Campaigns
current_catalog_description: Strengthen your understanding of gift planning and how to appeal to your donor's objectives. And, explore how to develop and launch a successful capital campaign.

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Nonprofit Prospect Management and Research Techniques
marketing_name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Nonprofit Prospect Management and Research Techniques
current_catalog_description: Efficient donor relations is an important part of your fundraising success. Explore tools to help understand and rate your prospects and move them from prospect to repeat donor.

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: How to Write a Development Plan and Manage A Development Office
marketing_name: Fundraising Certificate Series: How to Write a Development Plan and Manage A Development Office
current_catalog_description: Operating your development efforts with a strong plan and an effective team is crucial for your success. Learn techniques to strategically manage your development team.

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Grant Writing Essentials
marketing_name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Grant Writing Essentials
current_catalog_description: Dive into the world of grant writing in this one-day program. Leave with a stronger understanding of terminology, proposal writing and creating a budget for your grants.

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Measuring Social Impact
marketing_name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Measuring Social Impact
current_catalog_description: You are doing a lot, but are these efforts making a difference? Use a framework to evaluate your activities and meet evaluation requirements from funders.

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Budgeting for your Fundraising Program
marketing_name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Budgeting for your Fundraising Program
current_catalog_description: Prepare to tackle your nonprofit budget and planning process with tools and terminology that will give an accurate picture of the financial health of your organization.

name: Business Analytics and Data Visualization
current_catalog_description: Learn how to turn data into actionable insights and solve everyday business problems. Return to work with the tools and confidence to apply immediately.

name: Data-Driven Marketing
current_catalog_description: Dive into Google Analytics with our expert instructor. Learn to capture, interpret and use data to strengthen your digital marketing efforts.

name: Finance for Non-Financial Managers
current_catalog_description: Gain the foundation and tools you need to make better financial decisions at work. Practice in class to become a confident contributor upon returning to the office.

name: Influential Communication
current_catalog_description: Strengthen your communication skills and improve your ability to speak confidently, clearly and effectively. Apply anywhere from on-the-spot conversations to high-profile meetings.

name: Lean Six Sigma Black Belt
current_catalog_description: Learn to identify, address and correct problems using this hybrid approach of lean and six sigma methodologies. Take your green belt skills to the next level in this program.

name: The St. Thomas Executive Program (STEP)
current_catalog_description: Address the top 10 leadership skills needed to succeed in today's VUCA environment. The St. Thomas Executive Program (STEP) is a 9-day, 3-module program for mid-career leaders.

name: The Leadership and Management Program
current_catalog_description: Learn the essentials of successful leadership and concepts you can apply right away. From emotional intelligence to systems thinking, return to work with a new lens.

name: Future of Health Care Conference
current_catalog_description: Gain insight into the future of the health care industry at this annual conference. From affordable care to disruptive innovation, hear from those moving health care forward.

name: Six Sigma Green Belt Certificate
current_catalog_description: Take your foundational knowledge to the next level by earning a Six Sigma Green Belt Certificate. Learn how to use the DMAIC model in your process improvement projects.

name: Mini Master of Marketing Management
current_catalog_description: Gain the marketing tools and strategies you need to influence customers and drive growth with this survey of marketing competencies.

name: Decision Making and Execution
current_catalog_description: This program helps leaders understand how high-quality decisions are made and how poor decisions are avoided, gaining tools for making choices that result in clarity of direction and organizational alignment.

name: Project Management for the Accidental Project Manager
marketing_name: Project Management for the Accidental Project Manager
current_catalog_description: Learn the language and approaches to project management to be better equipped when participating in projects. Use real-world examples from your own experience.

name: Health Care Management Principles
current_catalog_description: The business of health care is complex and ever-changing. Dive into the key elements driving all aspects of the industry. Return to the office with tools to guide your team into the future.
